get.summary: Get all facts from the database
get.description: Get request to retrieve all facts from the database

post.summary: Adds a new facts to the database
post.description: Post request to add a new fact to the database

parameters.name: statement
parameters.description: Fact that is to be added

get.summary: Gets a specific fact, based off its ID, from the database
get.description: Get request to fetch a fact from the database

parameters.name: FactId
parameters.description: ID of fact to be fetched

delete.summary: Removes a fact, based off of it's ID, from the database
delete.description: Delete request to remove a fact from the database

parameters.name: FactId
parameters.description: ID of source to be deleted

parameters.description: ID of source to be fetched

parameters.name: SourceId
parameters.description: ID of known fake news source to be deleted

put.summary: Update a specific known fake news source
put.description: Put request to update a specific known fake news source

parameters.name: SourceId
parameters.description: ID of source to be updated

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: New name for the known fake news source

parameters.name: tld
parameters.description: New website address for the known fake news source
